results.content: Yes, it was very training and i got a good exposure to Webapi and its basics.
results.content_html: Yes, it was very training and i got a good exposure to Webapi and its basics.

results.content: I have been writing classical ASMX WebServices, WCF Services and some RESTful services for years. Excellent intro to WebAPI. Sandeep is a very clear trainer. I look forward to taking more courses from him.
results.content_html: I have been writing classical ASMX WebServices, WCF Services and some RESTful services for years. Excellent intro to WebAPI. Sandeep is a very clear trainer. I look forward to taking more courses from him.

results.content: This provided me with a great understanding of the basics for HTML, JS, ASP.NET, MVC and WebAPIs.  Nice slow pace, Sandeep seemed very knowledgeable about all of these subjects.  I am glad I took this course.
results.content_html: This provided me with a great understanding of the basics for HTML, JS, ASP.NET, MVC and WebAPIs. Nice slow pace, Sandeep seemed very knowledgeable about all of these subjects. I am glad I took this course.

results.content: The last two sections were too fast and superficial. Tehy must be improved. I could not find the material.
results.content_html: The last two sections were too fast and superficial. Tehy must be improved. I could not find the material.

results.content: Mr. Soni is excellent teacher, I love the way he teach, In my humble opinion in this course there are several topics covered which are really not required to learned Web API in general. But it certainly add's values to this course. Overall it's good course...
results.content_html: Mr. Soni is excellent teacher, I love the way he teach, In my humble opinion in this course there are several topics covered which are really not required to learned Web API in general. But it certainly add's values to this course. Overall it's good course...

results.content: He has skipped some advanced topics, so this course will be helpful for absolute beginners.
results.content_html: He has skipped some advanced topics, so this course will be helpful for absolute beginners.

results.content: There are only two sections on ASP.Net MVC.  To get the complete training on ASP.Net MVC, the students will have to subscribe to other training videos from the teacher's company web site.  The course title and description are misleading
results.content_html: There are only two sections on ASP.Net MVC. To get the complete training on ASP.Net MVC, the students will have to subscribe to other training videos from the teacher's company web site. The course title and description are misleading
